txt.en: Caras Gelebren, the Silver Bastion, was once the capital of Tham Mírdain and the jewel of Eregion. Determined to possess the Great Rings of Power, Sauron made war upon the Elves and led his vast armies to Eregion to lay waste to Caras Gelebren.
Complete 'Doom of Caras Gelebren' in a raid group

Caras Gelebren, the Silver Bastion, was once the capital of Tham Mírdain and the jewel of Eregion. Determined to possess the Great Rings of Power, Sauron made war upon the Elves and led his vast armies to Eregion to lay waste to Caras Gelebren.\n\nAid Lord Celebrimbor and help the Elves of Eregion make their stand against the forces of Sauron!
'You know of Caras Gelebren? We can help improve your rewards? Let us chat.'
